description: Demolition of an existing garage (Retrospective); and construction of a single-storey replacement garage (Proposed)
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawings numbered/titled: Location Plan; JN/0032/05; JN/0061/01; JN/0061/02; JN/0061/03; JN/0061/04; JN/0061/06; and JN/0061/07.

REASON: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials shall be in accordance with the materials described in the Application Form and Approved Plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | Samples of the materials to be used for the external surfaces of the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before any part of the development is commenced, and this condition shall apply notwithstanding any indications as to these matters which have been given in this application. Development shall be carried out in accordance with these approved details.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013, 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016). | Any garage constructed as part of the development hereby permitted shall only be used for vehicle parking and not for any separate residential use or for any industrial, commercial or business use.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy 7.6 of the London Plan (2016).
